main_title: How a Tornado Spared the Wright Brothers' Workshop
hook: [shocked] You won't believe this! In 1905, a fierce tornado roared through Dayton, Ohio, just blocks away from the Wright brothers' workshop.
description: A tornado missed the Wright brothers' workshop in 1905, saving their aviation dreams. What if it hadnâ€™t? #WrightBrothers #History #Aviation
